item.title: 印度保险公司要求监管机构提供更多对冲工具
item.description: 据参与讨论的人士透露，印度保险公司已与监管机构举行会谈，建议引入股票期权作为对冲工具，以加强其风险管理战略。【原文：Indian insurers have held talks with the regulator to propose the introduction of equity options as a hedging tool to boost their risk-management strategies, according to people involved in the discussions.】

item.title: JLR 所有者称利润受中国经济放缓影响
item.description: 捷豹路虎的印度所有者表示，中国市场的需求疲软和消费者对电动汽车的偏好正在损害传统高端汽车的销售，中国的经济挑战正在损害捷豹路虎的盈利能力。【原文：Jaguar Land Rover’s Indian owner said profitability is being hurt by economic challenges in China, a market where weak demand and consumer preference for electric vehicles are hurting sales of traditional top-end cars.】

item.title: 俄罗斯 ESPO 石油运输费用在制裁后上涨五倍
item.description: 据交易商称，俄罗斯ESPO原油运往中国的费用进一步飙升，目前的费率几乎是本月初美国制裁莫斯科石油业之前的五倍。【原文：The fee to ship Russian ESPO crude to China has spiked further, with rates now almost five times higher than what they were prior to US sanctions on Moscow’s oil industry earlier this month, according to traders.】

item.title: 出于安全考虑，日本将加强投资预审
item.description: 日本计划加强对可能与外国情报收集工作合作的海外投资者的预审措施，以解决日益严重的国家安全问题。【原文：Japan plans to strengthen pre-screening measures for overseas investors that could potentially cooperate with foreign intelligence gathering efforts, addressing rising national security concerns.】

item.title: 交易员纷纷押注欧洲央行超大规模降息
item.description: 交易员们正大举押注欧洲央行将在今年年中至少降息半点。【原文：Traders are placing big options bets on the European Central Bank delivering at least one half-point cut to interest rates by the middle of the year.】

item.title: 印度 JSW 钢铁公司寻求高达 9 亿美元的银团贷款
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，印度最大的钢铁制造商 JSW 钢铁有限公司正在寻求一笔高达 9 亿美元的贷款，为印度借款人的美元债务交易再添一笔。【原文：India’s largest steelmaker JSW Steel Ltd. is seeking a loan of as much as $900 million, according to people familiar with the matter, adding to a flurry of dollar debt deals from the nation’s borrowers.】

item.title: 丹尼尔-埃克的 Neko Health 公司融资 2.6 亿美元用于美国扩张
item.description: Neko Health 是 Spotify Technology SA 创始人丹尼尔-埃克（Daniel Ek）创办的一家初创公司，该公司已融资 2.6 亿美元，用于将其人体扫描技术引入美国。【原文：Neko Health, a startup from Spotify Technology SA founder Daniel Ek, has raised $260 million to bring its body-scanning technology to the US.】

item.title: 经济学家警告：英国将面临更频繁的经济衰退
item.description: 据彭博经济公司（Bloomberg Economics）称，在经济增速放缓使英国容易受到增长冲击的影响后，英国很可能面临更频繁的技术性衰退。【原文：Britain is likely to face more frequent technical recessions after a slowdown in the economy’s speed limit made it vulnerable to growth shocks, according to Bloomberg Economics.】

item.title: 印度股市比以往任何时候都更需要国内投资者
item.description: 由于外国基金抛售有增无减，全球波动加剧，削弱了本地股票的吸引力，印度股票市场对国内投资者的依赖程度空前高涨。【原文：The Indian equity market’s reliance on domestic investors has never been greater as unabated foreign fund selling and rising global volatility dent the appeal of local shares.】

item.title: 苏丹暴力引发骚乱，南苏丹关闭社交媒体
item.description: 南苏丹因其公民在邻国苏丹受到虐待而引发暴力抗议，随后南苏丹指示互联网服务提供商封锁所有社交媒体平台。【原文：South Sudan directed internet service providers to block all social media platforms following violent protests over the mistreatment of its citizens in neighboring Sudan.】

item.title: 富士媒体调查骚扰事件后，J-POP 偶像退出电视工作
item.description: 前男子组合 SMAP 成员中居正广（Masahiro Nakai）被报道骚扰了一名女性，富士电视台的一名员工卷入了这起事件，因此他将退出日本娱乐圈。【原文：Masahiro Nakai, a former member of the boy band SMAP, is retiring from the Japanese entertainment industry following reports that he harassed a woman and that an employee of Fuji TV was involved in the incident.】

item.title: 印度迫使苹果和谷歌向国家支持的应用程序商店开放
item.description: 印度正试图撬开世界上最大的应用程序商店的大门，从而可能与苹果公司和 Alphabet 公司在社会服务、安全标准和该国智能手机的使用权方面发生冲突。【原文：India is trying to pry open the doors of the world’s biggest app stores, setting up a likely clash with Apple Inc. and Alphabet Inc. over social services, safety standards and access to the country’s smartphones.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：英国股市连创新高后有望下滑
莫迪官员称印度将克服特朗普政策的影响
item.description: 印度总理纳伦德拉-莫迪（Narendra Modi）与世界最大经济体的关系将帮助印度克服唐纳德-特朗普总统领导下的全球贸易变化带来的任何 "负面影响"。【原文：Prime Minister Narendra Modi’s relationship with the world’s biggest economies will help India overcome any “negative impacts” from shifts in global trade under President Donald Trump, a top official said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 新加坡在洗黑钱案中起诉前董事
item.description: 新加坡已对王俊杰提出指控，他是当地一家企业服务提供商的前董事，与该市州创纪录的 30 亿新元（22 亿美元）洗钱案的涉案人员有关联。【原文：Singapore has charged Wang Junjie, the former director of a local corporate service provider linked to individuals caught up in the city-state’s record S$3 billion ($2.2 billion) money-laundering case.】

item.title: 尼日利亚石油卷土重来考验其对欧佩克+减产的承诺
item.description: 由于安全状况的改善，非洲最大的原油生产国尼日利亚摆脱了长达数年的产量低迷，这给政府带来了难题。【原文：Africa’s biggest crude producer Nigeria has emerged from a years-long output slump due to improved security, creating a quandary for the government.】

item.title: 沙特阿拉伯在线经纪商 Derayah 计划在利雅得上市
item.description: Derayah Financial Co.公司公布了在沙特阿拉伯首次公开募股的计划，拉开了沙特阿拉伯今年上市活动的序幕。【原文：Derayah Financial Co. unveiled plans for an initial public offering in Saudi Arabia, kicking off what is expected to be a busy year for listings in the kingdom.】

item.title: 印度上诉法院暂停 WhatsApp 反垄断裁决和罚款
item.description: 印度一家上诉法院暂时中止了对 WhatsApp 罚款的反垄断裁决，该裁决禁止 WhatsApp 与母公司 Meta Platforms Inc.【原文：An Indian appeals court temporarily halted an antitrust ruling that fined WhatsApp and prohibited the messenger from sharing user data with other firms and products owned by parent Meta Platforms Inc.】

item.title: 红山接近以 11 亿美元收购摇滚偶像马歇尔的交易
item.description: 据知情人士透露，洪山资本集团收购标志性音响设备制造商马歇尔集团（Marshall Group AB）的交易即将达成。【原文：HongShan Capital Group is nearing a deal to acquire iconic audio equipment maker Marshall Group AB, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 随着市场趋于平静，东京公寓价格 2024 年将从创纪录水平回落
item.description: 东京新建公寓价格在 2023 年大幅飙升之后，去年有所下降，趋向于更可持续的增长趋势。【原文：Tokyo new condo prices fell last year, moderating to a more sustainable growth trend after a big jump in 2023.】

item.title: 现代汽车利润下滑，汽车制造商警告增长放缓
item.description: 现代汽车公司公布的第四季度财报未能达到分析师的预期，这家韩国汽车制造商警告称，未来一年的增长可能会放缓。【原文：Hyundai Motor Co. reported fourth-quarter earnings that missed analysts’ estimates, with the South Korean automaker warning of potentially slower growth for the year ahead.】

item.title: 新加坡关键通胀指标在政策决定前放缓
item.description: 在周五即将做出货币政策决定之前，新加坡12月份的主要通胀指标降温至三年来最慢。【原文：Singapore’s key inflation gauge cooled to the slowest pace in three years in December, ahead of a monetary policy decision due Friday.】

item.title: 欧洲股市飙升的原因是廉价而非特朗普
item.description:
真正的乐观主义并不存在，尤其是在德国，但新政府可能是旧世界需要的一记重拳。【原文：

Real optimism is absent, especially in Germany, but the new administration might be the gut-punch the Old World needs.

】

item.title: 中东数十亿美元在达沃斯引起轰动，从黑石到贝克汉姆
item.description:
海湾国家利用在瑞士阿尔卑斯山举行的为期一周的活动展示了它们在全球舞台上变得更加重要的雄心壮志。【原文：

Gulf countries used the weeklong event in the Swiss Alps to showcase their ambitions to become even more relevant on the global stage. 

】

item.title: 土耳其将迎来市场预期的第二次降息
item.description: 土耳其央行将于周四再次大幅降息，官员们将密切关注通胀预期或流动性过剩的任何迹象。【原文：Turkey’s central bank is set to make another sizable interest-rate cut on Thursday, with officials keeping a close watch on any signs of a jump in inflation expectations or excess liquidity.】

item.title: 安哥拉计划今年出售最大电信公司和银行股份
item.description: 安哥拉经济协调国务部长若泽-德利马-马萨诺说，安哥拉计划在未来数月出售其最大电信公司Unitel SA和两家贷款机构的股份，以吸引投资者。【原文：Angola plans to sell stakes in its biggest telecommunications company, Unitel SA, and two lenders in the coming months to attract investors, Minister of State for Economic Coordination Jose de Lima Massano said.】

item.title: 沙特阿拉伯面临投资者对大型矿业雄心的质疑
item.description: 沙特阿拉伯在推动建设金属和矿业中心的过程中面临着一个关键时刻，外国企业对沙特的资金需求仍然大于部署资金的意愿。【原文：Saudi Arabia faces a pivotal moment in its push to build a metals and mining hub, with foreign players still showing more hunger for the kingdom’s cash than a willingness to deploy their capital.】

item.title: 势不可挡的美元迫使亚洲深挖外汇防御工具包
item.description: 随着特朗普政府的关税政策迫在眉睫，亚洲新兴市场的政策制定者们正在深入研究他们的工具包，以抵御持续走强的美元。【原文：Policy makers across Asia’s emerging markets are digging deeper into their toolkits to fend off a relentlessly strong greenback as Trump-administration tariffs loom.】

item.title: 中国南向债券流出量创 2022 年以来最高水平
item.description: 中国主权债券收益率的下降促使境内投资者积极寻找回报率更高的海外替代债券。【原文：Chinese sovereign bonds’ falling yields are driving onshore investors to actively hunt for overseas alternatives with higher returns.】

item.title: 菲律宾首次面向市场发行 2025 年全球债券
item.description: 菲律宾政府周四启动了由两部分组成的美元债券发行营销活动，这是其今年首次进入国际市场。【原文：The Philippine government on Thursday kicked off marketing of its two-part dollar bond offering, its first trip to the international market this year.】
